formatted_address: Persiaran Nusa Perintis, Nusa Puncak Taman Nusa Puncak, 79200 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Amansari Hotel Nusajaya

reviews.text:
I had a wonderful stay at Amansari Nusajaya. The staff were incredibly friendly, attentive, and professional, always ready to assist with a smile, which made me feel truly welcome. Special thanks to Ms. Manisha for going above and beyond.

The food and beverage service was outstanding. Especially buffet breakfast, was beautifully presented and absolutely delicious. The restaurant staff provided excellent recommendations and top-notch service.

‚ÄúBedbugs and Dirty Carpet‚Äù

Apart from the issue with bedbugs and the dirty carpet, everything else was satisfactory. Unfortunately, I found at least four bedbugs crawling on my pillow. I had to steam iron my bed before I could sleep. Since I checked in at 11 PM and only discovered the bedbugs at 2 AM, I didn't ask for a room change. Packing and unpacking again seemed too cumbersome, so I opted to steam iron my bed and pillow instead. I ended up killing a lot of bedbugs on the headboard. Moreover, my pillow smelled like it hadn't been washed in a year, making it impossible to sleep and I had only one pillow. The carpet also needs replacing, as it felt overly dense and uncomfortable. The infested room number is 1016. Please address these issues because the Hotel has strategic location, affordable, spacious with tons of rooms making it suitable to accommodate large groups. It would be a shame to let the hotel perished.

We have done our best to make it a comfortable place to tour. I hope you have a good time in a pleasant and cozy atmosphere. There are various amenities around you, so you can use them more conveniently. Please contact us if you need anything at any time. We sincerely welcome you and wish you a pleasant trip.

First time at this establishment.
It is rated 4-star, but sorry in my opinion its a 3-star establishment.
No lounge nor cafe in the hotel premise.
However, only breakfast is served at the restaurant The Pine.
No safe in the room to keep valuables,  nor a proper chair to sit, and our room is a Deluxe King!
The staff are friendly and attentive though üëèüëèüëèüëè

Came late around 2am and looking for room, i
Unfortunately the staff refused to accept us eventhough room is available. Claimed only can check in at 3pm

Dorce us to sunway city to look for other hotel

vicinity: Persiaran Nusa Perintis, Nusa Puncak Taman Nusa Puncak, Iskandar Puteri
